1.title: The Studio

episode of.title: Shandon Photography: A Closer Look (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

1.plot: Check out the first in our new series, "Shandon Photography: A Closer Look" where Shandon sits down to talk about his career, and shares insider tips about how to get headshots that actually work. First up is a behind-the-scenes look into Shandon's studio.

2.title: Wardrobe

episode of.title: Shandon Photography: A Closer Look (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

2.plot: Watch as Shandon tackles tough wardrobe decisions and shows actors how to feel empowered through their clothing choices, in the latest of our new series, "Shandon Photography: A Closer Look".

3.title: Backgrounds

episode of.title: Shandon Photography: A Closer Look (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

3.plot: Check out the latest in our series, "Shandon Photography: A Closer Look" as Shandon brings you into the workshop and explains the importance of creating intricate, textured background for your shoot.

4.title: The Biggest Mistake Actors Make

episode of.title: Shandon Photography: A Closer Look (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

4.plot: Check out the latest in our series, "Shandon Photography: A Closer Look" as Shandon discusses the biggest mistake actors make in preparing for their headshot session, and how to avoid it.

5.title: How Much Should I Spend on Headshots?

episode of.title: Shandon Photography: A Closer Look (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

5.plot: We know pursuing your acting career can be costly, but good headshots can make or break your chances of getting called in for an audition. Watch as Shandon explains why you should view headshots as an investment, not an expense, and what separates a professional shot from an amateur one.

6.title: Staying Present

episode of.title: Shandon Photography: A Closer Look (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

6.plot: Are you in the right state of mind for a successful headshot session? Mental preparedness is often overlooked amidst the many decisions you're forced to make while prepping for your photo shoot. Watch as Shandon discusses the value of being present, and the difference between just looking interesting and actually being engaged in the moment.

7.title: Being Prepared

episode of.title: Shandon Photography: A Closer Look (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

7.plot: Watch as Shandon goes over the three most important things you can do to prepare for your headshot session - and how they can make a big difference in your shoot.

imdb.title: Shandon Photography: A Closer Look
akas: Shandon Photography: A Closer Look (United States)
plot: Dive behind the scenes to see how one of the most successful headshot photographers in Los Angeles stays on top of the game, and lends advice to aspiring photographers and actors along the way.::Liberation Media
